name: FLEET (Eapple)
description:
FLEET 

is a singleplayer .io-style game where you battle with 100 bots on the open sea with over 20+ unique warships.

Start from a humble Dinghy with only the most meager firepower, then upgrade and pick a path to become the most powerful ship in the game.

FIREPOWER

There are 3 weapons systems in the game:

Guns

Explosive shells fired from guns, big or small, can be shot with great speed over a long distance. However, it comes at the cost of accuracy and damage, as it may take many salvos to land enough hits to sink the enemy.

Torpedoes

Packing a huge punch in one blow, torpedoes are a silent but deadly payload. Traveling slowly, torpedoes require greater attention to aim and positioning than guns, but can be extremely rewarding when they land a hit.

Bombers

While this is a game focused on warships, planes act as the most unique weapons systems staying exclusively in the sky. Planes can be launched from carriers and commanded to attack a ship, at which point they are completely automatically controlled.

Ending Statements

This project took 62 hours over 14 days to complete, making it one of the largest games I've built. Over 100+ sprites, images, and icons were created with Adobe Illustrator to deliver simple but readable vector graphic art.

This has been a dream project of mine, as I love naval-themed combat games. This is my second-ever browser game, and I've spent my best effort to make it run relatively smoothly on most devices.
